channel.title: Video on The Miette
channel.description: Recent content in Video on The Miette

item.title: How To Build a Window
item.description: Just a short update - Lys put together a little montage of our window building journey (over 8 months in the making) and we have started tackling the doors! Will update our door journey in the next post but for now enjoy the video! Catch ya later, Lys & Erny

item.title: Oct Build Update
item.description: An October build update We got solar! ☀️ ☀️ ☀️ Table Of Contents What we’ve done Highlights Challenges What’s next? What we’ve done One of our neighbours decided to demolish their house without removing their 10 year old solar system (it was not cost effective for them to re-install). Luckily for us they said that if we could take it down we could have it! Erny clambered onto the roof on a balmy Sunday day to bring the panels down.
